phrases: 5 Days Until Christmas
Is not Christmas great?
It is so exciting.
Why do not we all have a party on Christmas Eve?
That sounds like fun!
Christmas means chicken and cakes, does not it?
Sou, is there anything else you want to eat?
Let me see...
Christmas means salmon to me, I guess.
Salmon?
Why salmon for Christmas?
There is nothing wrong with salmon.
Right?
Is not salmon great?
Watermaple House Japan Server Akihabara City/ No Monsters No PVP Entry Restrictions/ None Exit Restrictions/ None
Um, is not this a little too short?
My legs are completely visible.
That is not true.
It is a perfect fit, Sia.
Fifteen centimeters above the knee for justice!
It is so cute!
I do not really know a lot about Christmas,
but I believe that Santa Claus was a man, was he not?
That is right.
Aww, Akatsuki's betraying us.
She will have to be punished.
Shattered Wings
Shattered Wings.
You are both so cute!
I could eat a hundred chickens!
That would be a snack after dessert!
Yes...
Right.
They are wearing miniskirt-Santa and reindeer outfits.
It is super-duper cute.
Miss Liese, who are you talking to?
I am reporting to my lord.
I am just joking.
I am not actually on the phone.
Thank goodness...
If that monster found out, who knows what he would say?
I am sorry.
That was a bit mean of me.
My lord is so dedicated to the princess, I could not help myself.
Everyone!
Mikakage Race/ Human Druid, Lv. 78 Roderic Merchant Guild
It is snack time!
Let us eat.
At first, it was only Akatsuki...
It is delicious.
This fruitcake looks like jewelry, does not it?
It does!
You are so good at desserts and cooking, Mikakage!
To me, sweets are an art,
and all other food is just for fun.
Nyanta's food is also good, though.
I cannot believe I get to eat delicious cake while I am protecting the princess.
This is a great job.
When are the D.D.D. members coming back?
I have been told that the attack on the goblins is going very well,
but at earliest, not till after New Year's.
They will not be back for Christmas, huh?
But we had a big event planned...
Everyone is really busy.
I have not seen Shiroe at all lately, either.
Is he locked in his room again?
He...
Well, Shiroe is not really the type that enjoys events like Christmas.
And I am sure there is a lot of work to do for the new year.
You are right.
It is really tough, is not it?
See you later, Princess.
Farewell.
Akatsuki!
Thanks for today.
For dressing up like that with me...
That was...
They forced me to do it.
But you come every day.
I have been meaning to thank you.
Thanks.
Well, it is my job...
See you tomorrow.
Okay.
When did I get so weak?
Guarding the princess...
I should be happy that my lord is relying on me.
But when I realize that he is thinking about her,
it hurts.
If I were like her, would things have been different between me and him?
But if I were like the princess...
I could not have been by my lord's side as an assassin.
Amenoma
Um...
May I ask a question?
What happened to the katana that was here?
We sold it.
Really?
Yeah, really.
They very boldly paid in cash.
Akatsuki seems like she is suffering.
Does she seem that way to you, too?
She does.
Normally, she is not the type to let her feelings show, so it is really obvious.
I see...
Akatsuki has been coming to observe the D.D.D. training sessions.
I only noticed her there once...
5 Days Until Christmas
But it looks like she is been there many times.
You know, we work hard to provide
the best raiding environment in Akihabara.
But it did not seem like she wanted to join.
I reported it to my lord,
and he said to allow her to watch as much as she liked.
I guess he owes Shiroe something.
He said to help Akatsuki if anything came up.
Is that so...
It is possible she is observing other guilds, as well.
Is she dissatisfied with her level or skills?
It may be something even more basic.
I think what Akatsuki wants is confidence.
I suppose all we can do is to stay by her side.
You are right.
Duvarcher's Bird Land Japan Server Mihama Area Field/ Monsters Present PVP Permitted Skill Use Permitted Entry Restrictions/ None Exit Restrictions/ None
The Teachings...
Shiroe said they are real.
Shiroe did?
Yeah, he says they exist.
If my lord says they exist, then they must.
Major combat guilds like D.D.D. and the Black Sword Knights
should have the world's best assassins.
If they are using the Teachings,
I want to see those techniques and their power for myself.
Get closer!
That was pathetic.
Move faster!
If I can learn the Teachings, then I, too...
We are having bouillabaisse today.
It will be done soon.
Have a seat and wait.
I am fine...
But it turned out really good.
And Rudy and the others will be back soon.
I am not hungry.
What is wrong with her?
Lately, she is been really down.
Yeah.
That stupid, too-perfect middle school girl.
She is a brat, a child, and a show-off...
I am embarrassed.
Whenever I see Minori, all I can think about is how jealous I am.
I am so ugly.
It is not Minori's fault.
She is working so hard.
I will work at least as hard as you.
I will do my best, so I do not because you problems.
Shiroe...
Minori helped my lord.
But I was so busy with my own problems, I could not help him.
I have always been by his side...
Yet I cannot be useful to him.
I have never been in a raid, so I am only a second-rate assassin.
I cannot even buy a first-rate weapon.
That is why my lord did not take me with him.
All I can do is fight, but I am weak...
I wish I were strong.
It sure has been lively around here lately.
Will they all be back again tomorrow?
Yes, we are going into town.
I see.
If the adventurers are protecting you,
that must make you feel secure.
They say we will have a delicious cream stew for dinner.
That is wonderful.
Adventurer-style?
Seems so.
Recently, everything's been adventurer-style.
I even had to wear a costume of someone called Santa Claus today.
Ah, I asked them to bring some things.
So that was among them, eh?
Huh?
I do not know anything about adventurer clothes,
so I wanted them to teach me.
So that is it...
But wearing clothes you are not used to is kind of tiring.
Well, I do not know if I should say this, but you seem to be having a good time.
I am glad you have made friends.
They are not my friends.
What?
But you look like you are having so much fun...
I am sure you sometimes feel uncertain or troubled, but...
I was not having fun talking to them.
They are not like us People of the Land.
They are adventurers.
But you...
The etiquette I have learned does not work with them.
If you are having fun, you say you are having fun.
If you are sad, you say you are sad.
If you are happy, you say you are happy.
Otherwise, they will not know what you are feeling, so that is what I am doing.
Normally, I am lazy, cowardly, and irresponsible.
I do not care about high society or nobility.
That is just my job.
Maybe she cannot be honest with herself because she is been expected to
be a perfect lady since she was little.
But he is the one exception, is not he?
Our march on the goblins is steadily raising the participants' levels.
If we keep fighting like this until spring,
they will be a powerful force when they return to Akihabara.
My lord?
Hm?
Oh, yes.
Are you bored?
Do you want a new toy or something?
Of course not.
If there is any change, let me know.
He is so easy to read.
Roderic Labs Japan Server Akihabara Separate Zone/ No Monsters PVP Permitted Entry Restrictions/ Yes Exit Restrictions/ Yes
What shall we do about the ambrosia?
Keep it going.
Roderic...
It is already night.
What?
That is strange.
I thought it was not even noon yet.
Even if you skip lunch, night will still come.
I have several matters to discuss with you.
How about joining me for lunch?
I told you, it is night now.
Then let us get some ramen.
Oh, all right.
Here you go!
Ramen
How is progress with the list I asked you for?
You need high-end phantasm- and treasure-class items...
And quite a lot of them.
But why include the flavor text?
There is some reason, I assume.
Well, I understand that we are the right people to come to.
We can work out a way to finance the research funds,
where other, smaller guilds could not.
I am very grateful.
It is none other than Shiroe's request.
I will do my best.
I am sure we will need this research eventually.
I am counting on you.
Chief Nyanta, do you have a moment?
Perfect timing.
I just came from the Roderic Merchant Guild.
Thank you.
I know I should have been the one to go.
Do not worry about it.
I got some tasty ramen out of the deal.
How is everyone doing?
The city's excited for Christmas,
but nothing's really changed.
It is that time already?
Um...
What about Akatsuki?
She is visiting Princess Lenessia daily.
All right.
I will contact you if there is anything else.
What did the chief say?
Nothing's really changed.
Oh, but he said everyone is excited for Christmas.
There is no way we will get this done in time for Christmas.
Enough!
Ow...
Thank you!
You really are strong, Kyouko.
I am level 90, after all.
Please tell us the secret to your strength!
Akatsuki...
This is nice!
Let us take it to the palace.
It will brighten the place up.
You are right.
Sia will be so happy.
You should not call the princess Sia, should you?
She laughed and looked happy, so it is fine.
Is that for Naotsugu?
Um, well, when he gets back,
I wanted to give him at least a little Christmas to enjoy...
A maiden in love!
I-It is not like that at all.
What about you, Henrietta?
Do you have anyone to give a present to?
Me?
I do not.
Really?
Come on...
If you are going to buy it, buy it.
Just wait a second.
Excuse me!
An unrequited love, from a safe distance.
This feeling is just a sweet ache I can live with.
Of course there are wishes that cannot come true.
I have gotten used to that pain.
Marie's bottomless cheer casts its glow on everyone around her.
It may be her self-confidence.
But Akatsuki...
Akatsuki is so bright!
She has not lost the easily injured vulnerability that grows numb as adulthood sets in.
That vulnerability may be her weak point,
but it is also a great treasure.
Not that she is realized that.
She is so precious, I just want to squeeze her tight right now!
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Princess Lenessia, you look so cute and fluffy.
Really?
I chose it from her wardrobe.
Well, let us go!
Before we get that stew, let us look around town.
I want Sia to learn more about Christmas.
Right.
Get too excited, and you will trip.
Ow...
The adventurers
are so different from us, I do not understand them at all.
Many People of the Land ask me various things about the adventurers,
but I do not know, either.
I deal with them every day,
but the number of things I do not understand keeps rising.
Even so, there is one thing I have learned.
The adventurers are only adventurers.
Even if I do not know the right answers,
it is a mistake to lump them all into a group,
and merely view them by their jobs or roles.
Even I know that.
The adventurers are jewels.
Each one of them is different,
and shines brightly.
They are special.
So I cannot call myself their friend.
We are here.
Restaurant Milky Margaret
The stew here is fantastic!
I heard it is super-duper good.
Let us hurry inside!
I will be leaving you all here.
What is wrong?
I have something to do.
All right.
We will take care of the rest.
Restaurant Milky Margaret
Is she going to watch someone train again?
Akatsuki's suffering, too.
She is like a dagger...
She is like an obsidian dagger,
strong and beautiful.
I know I cannot get stronger simply by watching people train.
I do not have the power needed to do anything...
I miss my lord.
I want to talk to him, just for a bit.
To get close to him, to tug on his coat.
To sit on the same sofa, and look out the window.
To eat red bean buns.
I want to be near him always.
Even if I am just in the background.
But that is just me lying to myself.
If I cannot fly anymore, I cannot be by my lord's side.
Right now,
I still cannot be with him.
I got three salted salmons at Shopping Street 8.
I am sure Sou will be happy!
Santa?
Enheart Nelreth/ Samurai
No, it is not!
A PKer?
But there is no fighting allowed inside towns!
The Royal Guard is not coming.
It is okay.
I am the West Wind Brigade's second captain for a reason!
There is no way I can lose!
When his dear friend is wounded, Soujirou's rage silently rises.
Lenessia is forced to make an important decision.
Akatsuki runs through the city, lost in thought.
As the snow falls, the battle with the murderer finally begins.
What secret of the Teachings does Soujirou share with Akatsuki?
Next time: Christmas Eve.
Christmas Eve
Rise up once more.
